title: 완곡하고 격식 있는 표현
description: 공손한 부탁이나 제안을 더욱 정중히 하는 말투를 익힙니다. It would be appreciated if you could, I was wondering if you could 같은 표현으로 격식 있는 부탁을 하고, 일상 회화에서는 돌려말하는 표현으로 부드러운 어조를 내는 것도 함께 익힙니다.
grammar_pattern: It would be appreciated if... / I was wondering if... / I'm not sure if... / Would it be possible to...?
examples: It would be appreciated if you could help me with this task.
I was wondering if you could join us for the meeting.
I'm not sure if this is the right approach.
Would it be possible to reschedule the appointment?
learning_points: 격식 있는 부탁과 완곡한 의견 표현으로 예의 바른 소통
